document_data.name: Owlswill
document_data.mainbody: '''Owlswill''' was some type of avian [[humanoid]] [[cleric]] that lived in the [[Kingdom of Mertwig]] around the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Owlswill's repertoire of known [[spell]]s included ''[[heal]]'', ''[[protection from evil]]'', and ''[[turn undead|scare the dead]]''.
document_data.History: When King [[Mertwig]] was on the verge of death at age 65, various fortune hunters and individuals claiming to be his long-lost heirs scoured his kingdom in search of wealth and treasure. During their journey to claim the throne, one of the would-be heirs of King Mertwig encountered Owlswill and recruited them to their adventuring company.<ref>
